Function vent_coeff_b¶

  • Defined in File physical_parameterizations.h

Function Documentation¶

codi::RealReverse vent_coeff_b(particle_model_constants_t &pc, uint64_t n)¶

Calculate the model constant of a particle model that is used for vaporization and melting processes with formulas such as

where is the diameter of the particle to melt/vaporize and is the particle velocity. From Seifert & Beheng (2006), Eq. 89:

Return

Parameters

  • pc: Model constants for a particle type

  • n: 1 for cosmo5
